translated: because it would follow, absurdly, that he would cognize only himself.

original: 'on te shes par byed pa yin pa'i phyir nges par byed pa yin na don ma shes na ci ltar shes par byed pa yin shes par byed pa las shes pa nges la shes pa des na shes par byed pa yin pa'i phyir phan tshun rten pa'i skyonüîΩdu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on te shes par byed pa yin pa'i phyir nges par byed pa yin na don ma shes na ci ltar shes par byed pa yin shes par byed pa las shes pa nges la shes pa des na shes par byed pa yin pa'i phyir phan tshun rten pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro //
translated: If the object is known, then the object is known by the cognition, and if the object is known by the cognition, then the cognition is the determiner because it causes the object to be known.üîΩThus there is the fault of mutual dependence.

original: snang ba bzhin du shes par byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: snang ba bzhin du shes par byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it causes the object to be known as an illumination,

original: ma yin te de shes par bya ba la yang shes par byed pa gzhan dgos pa'i phyir thug pa med do //
analyzed: ma yin te de shes par bya ba la yang shes par byed pa gzhan dgos pa'i phyir thug pa med do //
translated: no, because if it is to be known, it must be caused to be known by another cognition, and so on ad infinitum.

original: thams cad du snang ba shes par byed pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: thams cad du snang ba shes par byed pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Nor is it the case that everything is caused to be known by illumination.

original: snang bas shes par byas na yang mig la sogs pas ci bya /
analyzed: snang bas shes par byas na yang mig la sogs pas ci bya /
translated: If illumination causes the object to be known, what is the use of the eye, etc.?

original: de dag nyid sgra la sogs pa'i snang bar 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de dag nyid sgra la sogs pa'i snang bar 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the eye, etc. are the illumination of sound, etc.,

original: de ltan yang rang gi ngo bo la rnam par gnas pa'i phyir rang rtogs pa'i rang bzhin 'di ci ltar rig pa po yin zhes bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltan yang rang gi ngo bo la rnam par gnas pa'i phyir rang rtogs pa'i rang bzhin 'di ci ltar rig pa po yin zhes bshad par bya'o //
translated: then, because they exist in their own nature, how can they be the knower, which is by nature self-knowing?

original: de phyir 'di bdag tha dad pa //
analyzed: de phyir 'di bdag tha dad pa //
translated: Therefore, it is different from this self.

original: gang las 'di 'di rtogs pa zhes ;
analyzed: gang las 'di 'di rtogs pa zhes ;
translated: From what is this known?

original: ; byed pa yi ni las nges de //
analyzed: ; byed pa yi ni las nges de //
translated: The action is ascertained as that of which this is the action.

original: de yi sgrub byed can du grub //
analyzed: de yi sgrub byed can du grub //
translated: It is established as that which accomplishes it.

original: rig pa 'di'i rang gi ngo bor gyur pa tha dad pa gang las 'di ni sngon po 'am ser po 'di'i rtogs pa yin no zhe na nges pa'i rtogs pa de ni de'i sgrub par byed pa can du grub bo //
analyzed: rig pa 'di'i rang gi ngo bor gyur pa tha dad pa gang las 'di ni sngon po 'am ser po 'di'i rtogs pa yin no zhe na nges pa'i rtogs pa de ni de'i sgrub par byed pa can du grub bo //
translated: From what is different from the nature of this cognition, it is known that this is the cognition of this blue or yellow. This ascertained cognition is established as that which accomplishes it.

original: 'di'i nges pa ni de tsam las gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di'i nges pa ni de tsam las gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because its ascertainment arises from just that.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: It is said:

original: de yod na 'di yod pa'i phyir zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: de yod na 'di yod pa'i phyir zhes bshad zin to //
translated: Because when that exists, this exists.

original: rig pa 'di'i don dang 'brel pa de yang 'dra ba las gzhan gyis ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rig pa 'di'i don dang 'brel pa de yang 'dra ba las gzhan gyis ni ma yin te /
translated: That which is related to the object of this cognition is also not different from what is similar.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / rnam 'gas shes pa'i rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: 'di ltar / rnam 'gas shes pa'i rang bzhin ni //
translated: By what means is the nature of cognition

original: tha dad par ni byed na yang //
analyzed: tha dad par ni byed na yang //
translated: made different,

original: 'di ni don dang 'brel byed pa //
analyzed: 'di ni don dang 'brel byed pa //
translated: yet this accomplishes the relation with the object,

original: don gyi rang bzhin min gzhan gyur //
analyzed: don gyi rang bzhin min gzhan gyur //
translated: not becoming different from the nature of the object?

original: de phyir gzhal bya rtags pa yi //
analyzed: de phyir gzhal bya rtags pa yi //
translated: Therefore, the object of cognition is not a sign.

original: sgrub byed gzhal bya'i rang bzhin nyid //
analyzed: sgrub byed gzhal bya'i rang bzhin nyid //
translated: The nature of the object to be perceived is the proof.

original: sgrub par byed pa gzhan yin na //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa gzhan yin na //
translated: If the proof is something else,

original: de las dang 'brel mi 'grub po //
analyzed: de las dang 'brel mi 'grub po //
translated: it is not established as related to that.

original: de'i rnam pa can gyi rig pa ni 'di ni sngon po 'am ser po yin no zhes don rnam par 'jog par byed do //üîΩji ltar shes pa rnam pa dang ldan pa de ltar yang 'og @13a * //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa can gyi rig pa ni 'di ni sngon po 'am ser po yin no zhes don rnam par 'jog par byed do // ji ltar shes pa rnam pa dang ldan pa de ltar yang 'og @13a * //
translated: The cognition that has the form of that object determines the object, saying, ‚ÄúThis is blue,‚Äù or ‚ÄúThis is yellow.‚Äù

original: nas bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: nas bstan par bya'o //
translated: How cognition has a form will be explained later.

original: sgrub par byed pa gzhan yin na na rig pa las de dang 'brel par mi 'grub po //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa gzhan yin na na rig pa las de dang 'brel par mi 'grub po //
translated: If the proof is something else, it is not established as related to that cognition.

original: gal te rnam pa spangs pa yin na ji ltar de'i rig pa zhes nges pa yin /
analyzed: gal te rnam pa spangs pa yin na ji ltar de'i rig pa zhes nges pa yin /
translated: If it is devoid of form, how can it be ascertained as cognition of that?

original: mngon du byed pa nyid las nges par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: mngon du byed pa nyid las nges par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: It is ascertained from the fact that it is manifest.

original: mngon du byed pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig / don gyi ngo bo 'am /
analyzed: mngon du byed pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig / don gyi ngo bo 'am /
translated: What is this so-called manifestation? Is it the nature of the object?

original: 'on te shes pa yin nam /
analyzed: 'on te shes pa yin nam /
translated: Or is it cognition?

original: ci ste gzhan 'ga' zhig yin /
analyzed: ci ste gzhan 'ga' zhig yin /
translated: Or is it something else?

original: gal te mngon du byed pa yi //
analyzed: gal te mngon du byed pa yi //
translated: If you assert that manifestation

original: rang bzhin don la yod 'dod na //
analyzed: rang bzhin don la yod 'dod na //
translated: exists in the object by nature,

original: mngon du byed can shes pa yin //
analyzed: mngon du byed can shes pa yin //
translated: then the cognition that manifests

original: de ni ji ltar don cir 'gyur //üîΩ'on te mngon du byed pa yi //
analyzed: de ni ji ltar don cir 'gyur // 'on te mngon du byed pa yi //
translated: What would be the point of that?

original: rang bzhin shes pa nyid yin na //
analyzed: rang bzhin shes pa nyid yin na //
translated: If the nature of the object is the cognition,

original: don de ji ltar mngon du byas //
analyzed: don de ji ltar mngon du byas //
translated: how is that object cognized?

original: gzhan gyi ngo bo gzhan ma yin //üîΩgzhan la 'ang skyon 'dir 'gyur ba ni //
analyzed: gzhan gyi ngo bo gzhan ma yin // gzhan la 'ang skyon 'dir 'gyur ba ni //
translated: The nature of one thing is not another.üîΩThis fault is unavoidable

original: bzlog tu med pa kho na yin //
analyzed: bzlog tu med pa kho na yin //
translated: for those who hold this view.

original: 'di ltar / gal te mngon du byed pa don gyi ngo bo yin na /
analyzed: 'di ltar / gal te mngon du byed pa don gyi ngo bo yin na /
translated: Thus, if the nature of the object is the cognition,

original: sngon po la sogs pa ltar thun mong yin pa'i phyir don de thams cad kyis rig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa ltar thun mong yin pa'i phyir don de thams cad kyis rig par 'gyur ro //
translated: then like blue and so on, the object would be common to all, and thus everyone would cognize it.

original: mngon du byed pa don yin par 'thad pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon du byed pa don yin par 'thad pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is also not tenable that the cognition is the object,

original: shes pa'i chos yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa'i chos yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is a phenomenon of consciousness.

original: 'on te shes pa'i chos 'di don gyi yul can yin pa des na don rig par brjod do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te shes pa'i chos 'di don gyi yul can yin pa des na don rig par brjod do zhe na /
translated: If you say that this phenomenon of consciousness is the object, and thus it is said that the object is cognized,

original: don gyi yul can zhes bya ba yul gyi don gyi yin /
analyzed: don gyi yul can zhes bya ba yul gyi don gyi yin /
translated: then is the object the domain of the object?

original: don myong ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: don myong ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Or is the object the nature of the experience?

original: don myong ba zhes bya ba ci zhig /
analyzed: don myong ba zhes bya ba ci zhig /
translated: What is the nature of the experience?

original: shes pa'i don gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: shes pa'i don gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because it is the nature of the object of consciousness.

original: de nyid rig pa'i don gyi rnam pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de nyid rig pa'i don gyi rnam pa nyid yin no //
translated: But it is the aspect of the object of knowledge.

original: 'on te don las skyes pa'i phyir don myong ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te don las skyes pa'i phyir don myong ba yin no zhe na /
translated: But if it is the experience of the object because it arises from the object,

original: de lta yin na mig las kyang skyes pa'i phyir mig myong ngo zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta yin na mig las kyang skyes pa'i phyir mig myong ngo zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would be the experience of the eye because it arises from the eye.

original: don mthong gi mig ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: don mthong gi mig ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But the eye is not seen.

original: don mthong ba zhes bya ba'i don ci /
analyzed: don mthong ba zhes bya ba'i don ci /
translated: What is the meaning of the expression ‚Äúseeing the object‚Äù?

original: don mthong zhing bltas pa des na mthong ngo zhes brjod do //
analyzed: don mthong zhing bltas pa des na mthong ngo zhes brjod do //
translated: It is said that one sees because the object is seen and perceived.

original: ci mthong zhe na /
analyzed: ci mthong zhe na /
translated: What is seen?

original: rang gi ngo bos so //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos so //
translated: One‚Äôs own nature.

original: 'o na ni ji ltar rang gi ngo bo myong ba'i rang bzhin gyis mthong ba de bzhin du don don gyi rang bzhin gyis mthong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'o na ni ji ltar rang gi ngo bo myong ba'i rang bzhin gyis mthong ba de bzhin du don don gyi rang bzhin gyis mthong ba'i phyir /
translated: But then, just as one sees by the nature of the experience of one‚Äôs own nature, in the same way, one sees the object by the nature of the object.

original: don gyi rang bzhin ni don gyi sgrub byed yin la myong ba'i rang bzhin ni myong ba'i sgrub byed yin pas de'i rnam pa nyid thams cad kyi sgrub byed yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don gyi rang bzhin ni don gyi sgrub byed yin la myong ba'i rang bzhin ni myong ba'i sgrub byed yin pas de'i rnam pa nyid thams cad kyi sgrub byed yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: The nature of the object is the establishment of the object, and the nature of the experience is the establishment of the experience. Therefore, the form of that is the establishment of all.

original: gzhan ni shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo tha dad par byed pa yin yang don dang 'brel par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo tha dad par byed pa yin yang don dang 'brel par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: The other is the form of consciousness that is different, but it is not related to the object.

original: de yang de yi bdag nyid yin //
analyzed: de yang de yi bdag nyid yin //
translated: And that is of the nature of that.

original: des na 'bras bu don gzhan min //
analyzed: des na 'bras bu don gzhan min //
translated: Therefore, the effect is not a different object.

original: 'bras bu don gzhan yin par smra ba rnams la thams cad 'thad @13b par dka' ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'bras bu don gzhan yin par smra ba rnams la thams cad 'thad @13b par dka' ba'i phyir /
translated: For those who maintain that the effect is a different object, everything is difficult to establish.

original: shes pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i don gyi rnam pa nyid tshad ma yin zhing /
analyzed: shes pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i don gyi rnam pa nyid tshad ma yin zhing /
translated: The form of the object that is of the nature of consciousness is valid knowledge.

original: de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i rig pa ni tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i rig pa ni tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin no //
translated: Awareness that is of the nature of that is the effect of valid knowledge.

original: don gyi rnam pa nyams su myong ba ma rtogs par ni don rtogs pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don gyi rnam pa nyams su myong ba ma rtogs par ni don rtogs pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Without the realization of the experience of the form of the object, the realization of the object does not exist.

original: bde ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa ni don rig la ma yin te /
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa ni don rig la ma yin te /
translated: The form of pleasure, etc. is not of the object-awareness,üîΩbut of the awareness of that.

original: de'i khyad par las don khyad par du nyams su myong bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i khyad par las don khyad par du nyams su myong bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow, absurdly, that the object would be experienced as something distinct from the consciousness.

original: don bde ba'i rgyur nyams su myong ngo zhe na /
analyzed: don bde ba'i rgyur nyams su myong ngo zhe na /
translated: If you say that the object is experienced as the cause of pleasure,

original: gal te don gyi rnam pa med na bde ba nyid 'ba' zhig myong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te don gyi rnam pa med na bde ba nyid 'ba' zhig myong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would follow, absurdly, that you would experience only pleasure and not the absence of the aspect of the object.

original: don la myong ngo zhe na /
analyzed: don la myong ngo zhe na /
translated: If you say that the object is experienced,

original: sngon po la ser por ci'i phyir ma myang /
analyzed: sngon po la ser por ci'i phyir ma myang /
translated: then why is blue not experienced as yellow?

original: phan tshun mi mthun pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yang bde ba dang sngon po dag la yang mtshungs pas rang gi phyogs nyams pa yin no //
analyzed: phan tshun mi mthun pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yang bde ba dang sngon po dag la yang mtshungs pas rang gi phyogs nyams pa yin no //
translated: The response that they are mutually exclusive is also the same for pleasure and blue, and so your position is undermined.

original: btags zin pas btags pas chog go //
analyzed: btags zin pas btags pas chog go //
translated: Since it has already been imputed, it is sufficient to impute it.

original: de ni de'i rang gi ngo bo nyid yin gyi rig pa'i bya pa ni med do zhe na /
analyzed: de ni de'i rang gi ngo bo nyid yin gyi rig pa'i bya pa ni med do zhe na /
translated: It is the intrinsic nature of that consciousness, but there is no activity of awareness.

original: 'di ltar brjod pa /üîΩde yi bdag nyid 'dzin pa de //
analyzed: 'di ltar brjod pa / de yi bdag nyid 'dzin pa de //
translated: In response to this, it is said:üîΩThe apprehension of that

original: don rtogs pa yi bdag nyid kyi //üîΩbyed pas rang gi las la ni //
analyzed: don rtogs pa yi bdag nyid kyi // byed pas rang gi las la ni //
translated: Is, in terms of the activity of realizing the object,üîΩLike the activity of the agent

original: byed dang bcas pa lta bur snang //
analyzed: byed dang bcas pa lta bur snang //
translated: With regard to its object.

original: bdag nyid byed po min na yang //
analyzed: bdag nyid byed po min na yang //
translated: Even though it is not the agent,

original: de yi dbang gis der gzhag phyir //
analyzed: de yi dbang gis der gzhag phyir //
translated: Therefore, the designation of the object is made on the basis of that.

original: don dam par ni gang la yang gang gi byed pa med do //
analyzed: don dam par ni gang la yang gang gi byed pa med do //
translated: In reality, nothing whatsoever is the activity of anything.

original: don rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid de lta de ltar gyur pa dag la /
analyzed: don rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid de lta de ltar gyur pa dag la /
translated: The intrinsic reality of objects is just as it is.

original: de kho na ma yin pa dag gis sgro btags pas byed par brjod kyi don dam par ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de kho na ma yin pa dag gis sgro btags pas byed par brjod kyi don dam par ni ma yin no //
translated: It is said that the activity of the object is the superimposition of that which is not reality by those who are not realists.

original: skyes bu'i rang gi don ni shes pa yin te /
analyzed: skyes bu'i rang gi don ni shes pa yin te /
translated: The purpose of a person is knowledge,

original: bde ba'i shes pa bzhin no //
analyzed: bde ba'i shes pa bzhin no //
translated: like the knowledge of pleasure.

original: dper na bde ba'i shes pa skyes pa ni rang gi don can yin gyi /
analyzed: dper na bde ba'i shes pa skyes pa ni rang gi don can yin gyi /
translated: For example, the arising of the knowledge of pleasure is for one‚Äôs own purpose.

original: bde ba'i shes pas cung zad byas pa ni med pa de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa'i shes pa yang rang gi ngo bo nyid rang gi don yin gyi des shes par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bde ba'i shes pas cung zad byas pa ni med pa de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa'i shes pa yang rang gi ngo bo nyid rang gi don yin gyi des shes par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: There is nothing that the knowledge of pleasure does. In the same way, the knowledge of form and so on is for one‚Äôs own purpose, but it is not that it is made known by that.

original: de don las skyes pa'i phyir na de tsam gyi tha snyad rdzogs pas don la byed pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: de don las skyes pa'i phyir na de tsam gyi tha snyad rdzogs pas don la byed pas ci zhig bya /
translated: Since it arises from the object, the designation of that much is complete. What is the use of saying that the object is the activity of the knowledge?

original: 'o na don rig pa 'bras bur mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na don rig pa 'bras bur mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If that is so, the knowledge of the object would not be the result.

original: 'bras bu don gyi rnam par rig pa yang don rig pa yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba ci yod /
analyzed: 'bras bu don gyi rnam par rig pa yang don rig pa yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba ci yod /
translated: Also, the result, the awareness of the object, is the awareness of the object, so what is the contradiction?

original: 'on ci ltar don rig go des tha dad pa'i tha snyad du 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'on ci ltar don rig go des tha dad pa'i tha snyad du 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If you ask, ‚ÄúHow does the awareness of the object become a convention of difference?‚Äù

original: don gyi rnam pa 'dzin pa de nyid la rig par byed pa zhes tha snyad 'dogs so //
analyzed: don gyi rnam pa 'dzin pa de nyid la rig par byed pa zhes tha snyad 'dogs so //
translated: The apprehension of the aspect of the object is itself designated as awareness.

original: 'di ltar gang gi tshe mig gi rnam par shes pa ser po spangs nas sngon po la sogs pa la 'jug pa de'i tshe 'dor ba dang len pa'i mtshan nyid kyis byed pa dang @14a * //
analyzed: 'di ltar gang gi tshe mig gi rnam par shes pa ser po spangs nas sngon po la sogs pa la 'jug pa de'i tshe 'dor ba dang len pa'i mtshan nyid kyis byed pa dang @14a * //
translated: When the eye consciousness abandons yellow and engages blue, at that time it appears as if it possesses an agent that has the character of discarding and accepting,

original: ldan pa lta bur mngon pa dang / gang gi tshe sngon po myong ba ni sngon po'i rang bzhin nyid yin na /
analyzed: ldan pa lta bur mngon pa dang / gang gi tshe sngon po myong ba ni sngon po'i rang bzhin nyid yin na /
translated: and when the experience of blue is the nature of blue,

original: gzhan gyi ngo bo gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ser po la mi 'pho ba des na /
analyzed: gzhan gyi ngo bo gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ser po la mi 'pho ba des na /
translated: since it is not different from the essence of another, it does not move to yellow.

original: de tha dad pa dang / byed pa dang bcas par rig pas rnam par gzhag pa yin zhing de yang don gyis rtogs pa nyid yin la ;
analyzed: de tha dad pa dang / byed pa dang bcas par rig pas rnam par gzhag pa yin zhing de yang don gyis rtogs pa nyid yin la ;
translated: Therefore it is posited as different and as possessing an agent, and that is the realization of the object.

original: don dam par ni de dang de ma yin pa'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa gzhan dang gzhan nyid de /
analyzed: don dam par ni de dang de ma yin pa'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa gzhan dang gzhan nyid de /
translated: In reality, there is no difference between the consciousnesses that have the aspects of that and not that.

original: de la tha dad pa dang byed pa dag yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de la tha dad pa dang byed pa dag yod pa ma yin no //
translated: In this regard, there is no difference and no activity.

original: tha dad byed pa'i rtog pa ni //
analyzed: tha dad byed pa'i rtog pa ni //
translated: The conceptualization of difference

original: rjes 'gro ldog pa dag las de //üîΩthogs med bag chags dang 'brel las //
analyzed: rjes 'gro ldog pa dag las de // thogs med bag chags dang 'brel las //
translated: is from the perspective of following and reversing.üîΩIt is not direct perception, but is related to the latent propensities of the non-Buddhist schools.

original: mngon sum sngon 'gro can ma yin //
analyzed: mngon sum sngon 'gro can ma yin //
translated: It is not direct perception, but is related to the latent propensities of the non-Buddhist schools.

original: rigs mthun snga ma'i rnam par shes //üîΩnyams myong gis bskyed bag chags ni //
analyzed: rigs mthun snga ma'i rnam par shes // nyams myong gis bskyed bag chags ni //
translated: The prior consciousness of a similar typeüîΩis produced by experience.

original: ldog par rnam rtogs bon te //
analyzed: ldog par rnam rtogs bon te //
translated: The latent propensities that are the seeds of conceptualization

original: long ba brgyud pa kho nar zad //
analyzed: long ba brgyud pa kho nar zad //
translated: are like a series of blind people.

original: bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag go //
analyzed: bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag go //
translated: These are the verses in the middle.

original: gal te de'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa des bskyed na don de nyid de la byed par 'gyur gyi don la ni shes pas ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te de'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa des bskyed na don de nyid de la byed par 'gyur gyi don la ni shes pas ma yin na /
translated: If it is produced by the consciousness that has the aspect of that, then that object would be the activity of that consciousness, but the object is not the activity of consciousness.

original: de ji ltar shes pas don 'dzin zhes bya bar nges she na /
analyzed: de ji ltar shes pas don 'dzin zhes bya bar nges she na /
translated: How is it certain that consciousness apprehends the object?

original: 'di la lan ni /
analyzed: 'di la lan ni /
translated: The answer to this is:

original: dper na 'bras bu rgyu rnams kyi //
analyzed: dper na 'bras bu rgyu rnams kyi //
translated: For example, the effect is of the causes.

original: bdag nyid 'dra bar 'byung ba'i phyir //
analyzed: bdag nyid 'dra bar 'byung ba'i phyir //
translated: Because it arises as if it were that.

original: bya ba ldan nyid ma yin yang //
analyzed: bya ba ldan nyid ma yin yang //
translated: Even though it does not possess the action of apprehending,

original: 'jig rten rgyu gzugs 'dzin zhes brjod //üîΩdper na pha dang 'dra ba'i bu //
analyzed: 'jig rten rgyu gzugs 'dzin zhes brjod // dper na pha dang 'dra ba'i bu //
translated: the world says that consciousness apprehends form as its object.üîΩFor example, even though a son who is like his father does not possess the action of apprehending his father, the world says that he apprehends his father.

original: skyes pa 'dzin pa'i byed pa dang ldan pa ma yin yang 'jig rten na pa'i gzugs 'dzin to zhes brjod pa de bzhin du shes pa la yang tha snyad byed pa'i phyir 'gal ba ci yod /
analyzed: skyes pa 'dzin pa'i byed pa dang ldan pa ma yin yang 'jig rten na pa'i gzugs 'dzin to zhes brjod pa de bzhin du shes pa la yang tha snyad byed pa'i phyir 'gal ba ci yod /
translated: In the same way, what contradiction is there in using the term ‚Äúconsciousness‚Äù in regard to consciousness?

original: de la ni de'i rnam pa mthong na de ltar ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: de la ni de'i rnam pa mthong na de ltar ji ltar zhe na /
translated: But how can it be said that one sees the form of that object when one sees its image?

original: 'di la yang mya ngan la sogs par mthong ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'di la yang mya ngan la sogs par mthong ba nyid do //
translated: In this case, it is just as in the case of seeing grief, etc.

original: de'i rnam pa de ni de'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa nyid las yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i rnam pa de ni de'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa nyid las yin gyi /
translated: The image of that object is in the consciousness that has that image,

original: don las ni ma yin no zhes mi brtsad do //
analyzed: don las ni ma yin no zhes mi brtsad do //
translated: but it is not in the object.

original: re zhig de'i rnam pa nyid las de'i rnam pa yin par ni dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: re zhig de'i rnam pa nyid las de'i rnam pa yin par ni dmigs pa yin no //
translated: The image of that object is perceived as the image of that object.

original: gal te mthong ba la rgyu bag chags kyi nus pa yod na ni nyams su myong ba las de'i rnam pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gal te mthong ba la rgyu bag chags kyi nus pa yod na ni nyams su myong ba las de'i rnam pa nyid yin no //
translated: If the cause of seeing is the power of latent impressions, then it is the aspect of that experience.

original: 'on te sngon ma mthong ma thos pa la 'jug na ni ;
analyzed: 'on te sngon ma mthong ma thos pa la 'jug na ni ;
translated: But if it engages what was not seen or heard before,

original: de'i tshe bag chags kyi nus pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i tshe bag chags kyi nus pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: then at that time, because there is no power of latent impressions,

original: rgyu gzhan las yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyu gzhan las yin pa'i phyir /
translated: it is from another cause.

original: de'i rgyu phyi rol gyi don yin no //
analyzed: de'i rgyu phyi rol gyi don yin no //
translated: Therefore, the cause of that is an external object.

original: 'di ltar / bag chags las byung gang yin pa //
analyzed: 'di ltar / bag chags las byung gang yin pa //
translated: Thus, that which arises from latent impressions

original: de ni gcig nyid la yod yin //
analyzed: de ni gcig nyid la yod yin //
translated: exists in a single thing.

original: don ni gnas par 'gyur na 'dir //
analyzed: don ni gnas par 'gyur na 'dir //
translated: If the object exists,

original: thams cad thun mong bar skye 'gyur //
analyzed: thams cad thun mong bar skye 'gyur //
translated: then all would arise in common.

original: de'i phyir don gyi @14b rnam pa nyid sgrub par byed pa yin no //üîΩde'i phyir mthong dang dbang 'brel dang // khyad par gyi ni blo de dag / bya ba la ni chod pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de'i phyir don gyi @14b rnam pa nyid sgrub par byed pa yin no // de'i phyir mthong dang dbang 'brel dang // khyad par gyi ni blo de dag / bya ba la ni chod pa'i phyir //
translated: Therefore, the aspect of the object itself is established.üîΩTherefore, we do not assert that the cognition of seeing,

original: tshad ma nyid du mi 'dod do //
analyzed: tshad ma nyid du mi 'dod do //
translated: the cognition of the sense faculties, and the cognition of distinctions are valid cognitions because they are obstructed from their objects.

original: kha cig na re lta ba'i shes pa tshad ma yin la /
analyzed: kha cig na re lta ba'i shes pa tshad ma yin la /
translated: Some say: The cognition of seeing is a valid cognition.

original: de las gzhan rig la sogs pa'i khyad par can gyi dngos por nges pa'i bdag nyid can ni 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: de las gzhan rig la sogs pa'i khyad par can gyi dngos por nges pa'i bdag nyid can ni 'bras bu yin no //
translated: The effect is the self that is ascertained as a thing that has a specific quality, such as knowledge.

original: de las kyang 'jug pa /
analyzed: de las kyang 'jug pa /
translated: From that, there is engagement.

original: de las thob pa /
analyzed: de las thob pa /
translated: From that, there is attainment.

original: de las ni bde ba ste /
analyzed: de las ni bde ba ste /
translated: From that, there is pleasure.

original: snga ma snga ma ni tshad ma yin la /
analyzed: snga ma snga ma ni tshad ma yin la /
translated: The former is the valid knowledge,

original: phyi ma phyi ma ni 'bras bu yin no zhes bya ba ni rim pa yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: phyi ma phyi ma ni 'bras bu yin no zhes bya ba ni rim pa yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: and the latter is the effect. This is the sequence.

original: don so sor nges par rnam par gzhag pa ni rnam pa'i stobs nyid kyis yin gyi gzhan las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: don so sor nges par rnam par gzhag pa ni rnam pa'i stobs nyid kyis yin gyi gzhan las ni ma yin no //
translated: The determination of the object is established by the power of the aspect itself, not by another.

original: gal te lta ba'i rnam par shes pa so sor nges pa'i rnam pa la mi brten na ci ltar 'di 'di'i lta ba yin zhes bya bar 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te lta ba'i rnam par shes pa so sor nges pa'i rnam pa la mi brten na ci ltar 'di 'di'i lta ba yin zhes bya bar 'gyur /
translated: If the visual consciousness does not rely on the aspect of the determination of the object, how can it be called the seeing of that?

original: de bzhin du nges pa la sogs pa'i shes pa gzhan yang 'di lta bu kho nar de nyid kyi tha snyad thob pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du nges pa la sogs pa'i shes pa gzhan yang 'di lta bu kho nar de nyid kyi tha snyad thob pa yin no //
translated: In the same way, the other consciousnesses, such as the determination of the object, obtain the designation of that by this alone.

original: rgyu snga ma snga ma ni phyi ma phyi ma nyid las rgyur 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: rgyu snga ma snga ma ni phyi ma phyi ma nyid las rgyur 'gyur gyi /
translated: The former cause is the cause of the latter.

original: so sor nges pa'i don rnam par 'jog pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: so sor nges pa'i don rnam par 'jog pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it does not establish the specific object.

original: de la ni de'i rnam pa nyid sgrub byed yin no //üîΩ'di ltar / bya ba la ni byed pa rnams //
analyzed: de la ni de'i rnam pa nyid sgrub byed yin no // 'di ltar / bya ba la ni byed pa rnams //
translated: In that case, the form of that is the proof.üîΩThus:üîΩEven though all the agents

original: thams cad nye bar sbyor na yang //
analyzed: thams cad nye bar sbyor na yang //
translated: are applied to the action,

original: tha ma'i tha dad byed gang de //
analyzed: tha ma'i tha dad byed gang de //
translated: that which is the specific doer

original: de yi sgrub byed dam par 'dod //
analyzed: de yi sgrub byed dam par 'dod //
translated: is considered the best proof.

original: rgyu thams cad bya ba la nye bar sbyor yang de ji ltar khyad par du 'phags /
analyzed: rgyu thams cad bya ba la nye bar sbyor yang de ji ltar khyad par du 'phags /
translated: Even though all the causes are applied to the action, how is that the best?

original: bya ba sgrub par byed pa tsam ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bya ba sgrub par byed pa tsam ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not just the mere accomplishment of the action,

original: de yod kyang gang zhig bya ba la mchod pa med pa de nyid sgrub par byed pa dam pa yin no //
analyzed: de yod kyang gang zhig bya ba la mchod pa med pa de nyid sgrub par byed pa dam pa yin no //
translated: because even if that exists, that which is not applied to the action is the best proof.

original: 'di ltar dbang po la sogs pa dag yod kyang /
analyzed: 'di ltar dbang po la sogs pa dag yod kyang /
translated: Thus, even though the sense faculties and so on exist,

original: yul thag ring ba la sogs pas gal te so sor nges pa'i rnam pa ma thob na /
analyzed: yul thag ring ba la sogs pas gal te so sor nges pa'i rnam pa ma thob na /
translated: if the form of the specific object is not obtained due to the object being distant and so on,

original: de'i tshe de'i rnam pa can gyi don yongs su gcod pa rnam par mi gnas so //
analyzed: de'i tshe de'i rnam pa can gyi don yongs su gcod pa rnam par mi gnas so //
translated: then at that time the ascertainment of the object having that form is not established.

original: de dang bar ma chod par gyur pa de bya ba yin pa'i phyir de nyid sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de dang bar ma chod par gyur pa de bya ba yin pa'i phyir de nyid sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: Since it is the object that is the cause of the cognition, it is the object that is established.

original: yul thag ring ba ma yin pa nyid sgrub par byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: yul thag ring ba ma yin pa nyid sgrub par byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the object is established as not being distant,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so,

original: yul thag ring ba ma yin yang dbang po nyams na nges pa rnam par gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul thag ring ba ma yin yang dbang po nyams na nges pa rnam par gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because even though the object is not distant, if the sense faculty is impaired, there is no definite determination.

original: 'o na ma nyams pa sgrub byed yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ma nyams pa sgrub byed yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the nonimpairment of the sense faculty is the proof,

original: de yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang ma yin te /
translated: that is not so,

original: 'di ltar / dbang po nyams pa med pa ni //üîΩmyong ba'i de yi rnam pa yi //
analyzed: 'di ltar / dbang po nyams pa med pa ni // myong ba'i de yi rnam pa yi //
translated: because the sense faculty is not impaired.

original: khyad par las ni yul yin no //
analyzed: khyad par las ni yul yin no //
translated: The object is determined from the special experience of that.

original: de phyir de ni chod pa yin //
analyzed: de phyir de ni chod pa yin //
translated: Therefore, it is obstructed.

original: rnam pa de nyid chod par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: rnam pa de nyid chod par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt the form itself obstructed?

original: rnam pa des nges par @15a * //
analyzed: rnam pa des nges par @15a * //
translated: If you say that the sense faculty, which is determined by that form,

original: byas pa'i dbang po ma nyams pa ni don so sor nges par rnam par gnas pa'i rgyu yin no zhe na /
analyzed: byas pa'i dbang po ma nyams pa ni don so sor nges par rnam par gnas pa'i rgyu yin no zhe na /
translated: is the cause of the definite determination of the object,

original: de ni legs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni legs pa ma yin te /
translated: that is not good,üîΩbecause

original: 'di ltar / gal te rnam par nges pa ni //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gal te rnam par nges pa ni //
translated: if the sense faculty is impaired,

original: grub na de yis don gnas te //
analyzed: grub na de yis don gnas te //
translated: If it is established, then the object is established.üîΩWhat is the point of establishing a non-defective sense faculty

original: grub la rgyu min gzhan pa dag / ci zhig rgyas par byed pa yin //üîΩrnam par nges pa ma grub par ni dbang po ma nyams pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: grub la rgyu min gzhan pa dag / ci zhig rgyas par byed pa yin // rnam par nges pa ma grub par ni dbang po ma nyams pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: when the object is not established?üîΩIf the object is established, then the sense faculty is not needed, because the object is already established.üîΩIf the sense faculty is established, then the object is not established.üîΩIf the object is established, then the sense faculty is not needed.

original: gal te de grub na de nyid kyis don rnam par gnas pa'i phyir dbang po ma nyams pa don med do //üîΩdon grub pa las ni 'gal yang sgrub par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te de grub na de nyid kyis don rnam par gnas pa'i phyir dbang po ma nyams pa don med do // don grub pa las ni 'gal yang sgrub par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: If the object is not established, then the sense faculty is not needed.üîΩIf the object is established, then the sense faculty is not needed.üîΩIf the object is not established, then the sense faculty is not needed.

original: grub zin pa la sgrub par byed pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //üîΩdes na grub pa nye bar 'jog par byed pa gang la ltos par bya ba yin /
analyzed: grub zin pa la sgrub par byed pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro // des na grub pa nye bar 'jog par byed pa gang la ltos par bya ba yin /
translated: If the object is established, then the sense faculty is not needed.üîΩIf the object is not established, then the sense faculty is not needed.üîΩIf the object is established, then the sense faculty is not needed.üîΩIf the object is not established, then the sense faculty is not needed.

original: de'i rnam pa yang des rnam par gnas pa na nges par byed pa gzhan la ltos par bya ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i rnam pa yang des rnam par gnas pa na nges par byed pa gzhan la ltos par bya ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If the object is established, then the sense faculty is not needed.

original: ma yin te mngon sum gyi tshad ma'i skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te mngon sum gyi tshad ma'i skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If the object is not established, then the sense faculty is not needed.

original: goms pa yod na ni mngon sum tshad ma yin te /
analyzed: goms pa yod na ni mngon sum tshad ma yin te /
translated: If the object is established, then the sense faculty is not needed.üîΩIf the object is not established, then the sense faculty is not needed.üîΩIf the object is established, then the sense faculty is not needed.üîΩIf the object is not established, then the sense faculty is not needed.üîΩIf the object is established, then the sense faculty is not needed.üîΩIf the object is not established, then the sense faculty is not needed.üîΩIf the object is established, then the sense faculty is not needed.üîΩIf the object is not established, then the sense faculty is not needed.üîΩIf the object is established, then the sense faculty is not needed.üîΩIf the object is not established, then the sense faculty is not needed.üîΩIf the object is established, then the sense faculty is not needed.üîΩIf the object is not established, then the sense faculty is not needed.üîΩIf the object is established, then the sense faculty is not needed.üîΩIf the object is not established, then the sense faculty is not needed.üîΩIf the object is established, then the sense faculty is not needed.üîΩIf the object is not established, then the sense faculty is not needed.üîΩIf the object is established, then the sense faculty is not needed.üîΩIf the object is not established, then the sense faculty is not needed.üîΩIf the object is established, then

original: nges pa med kyang de'i tshe de'i rnam pa tsam las 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: nges pa med kyang de'i tshe de'i rnam pa tsam las 'jug pa yin no //
translated: Even though there is no certainty, at that time, it operates only in the aspect of that.

original: gang gi tshe nges pa la ltos pa de'i tshe ni rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe nges pa la ltos pa de'i tshe ni rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma yin no //
translated: When it does depend on certainty, then it is the valid knowledge of inference.

original: de yang rnam pa tsam kho na las 'jug pa'i phyir gzhan la mi ltos so //
analyzed: de yang rnam pa tsam kho na las 'jug pa'i phyir gzhan la mi ltos so //
translated: And that also operates only in the aspect, so it does not depend on anything else.

original: de'i phyir rnam pa las gzhan ni byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam pa las gzhan ni byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not the case that something other than the aspect is the object.

original: de bzhin du thun mong yin pa'i phyir te ;
analyzed: de bzhin du thun mong yin pa'i phyir te ;
translated: In the same way, it is because it is common.

original: kun gyi mtshungs rgyu yin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: kun gyi mtshungs rgyu yin pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it is the common cause of all.

original: 'di 'dra dbang po la yod min //
analyzed: 'di 'dra dbang po la yod min //
translated: Such is not the case with the sense faculties.

original: de tha dad kyang tha dad med //
analyzed: de tha dad kyang tha dad med //
translated: Even though they are different, they are not different.

original: 'di yi 'di zhes de gang las //
analyzed: 'di yi 'di zhes de gang las //
translated: How is this so?

original: dbang po'i tha dad par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang po'i tha dad par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The sense faculties are not the cause of the difference.

original: thun mong du sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i yul thams cad la rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thun mong du sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i yul thams cad la rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are the common cause of all objects such as blue and yellow.

original: gal te sngon po dang ser po dang / de gnyi ga ma yin pa'i yul la dbang po gzhan dang gzhan 'byung ba ma yin nam de la mngon par phyogs pa ni der gzhan nyid yin te /
analyzed: gal te sngon po dang ser po dang / de gnyi ga ma yin pa'i yul la dbang po gzhan dang gzhan 'byung ba ma yin nam de la mngon par phyogs pa ni der gzhan nyid yin te /
translated: But is it not the case that a different sense faculty arises for each object, such as blue, yellow, and neither blue nor yellow? And the fact that it is directed toward that object is its difference from others.

original: des na chos tha dad pas dbang po tha dad do //
analyzed: des na chos tha dad pas dbang po tha dad do //
translated: Therefore, because the object is different, the sense faculty is different.

original: de'i phyir de tha dad pa nyid las tha dad par rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir de tha dad pa nyid las tha dad par rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, because it is understood to be different due to its difference from that,

original: de ji ltar na /üîΩkun gyi mtshungs rgyu yin phyir ro ;
analyzed: de ji ltar na / kun gyi mtshungs rgyu yin phyir ro ;
translated: how can it be said thatüîΩit is the cause of the cognition of all,

original: ; zhes brjod ce na /
analyzed: ; zhes brjod ce na /
translated: because it is the common cause of all?

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: mngon du phyogs pa'i khyad par ni rnam pa tha dad pa med par rtogs par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon du phyogs pa'i khyad par ni rnam pa tha dad pa med par rtogs par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the difference in being directed toward is not able to be understood without a difference in aspect.

original: des na de tha dad pa yin yang rnam pa dang bral ba 'di'i sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i yul la phyogs zhes bya ba ga las yin /
analyzed: des na de tha dad pa yin yang rnam pa dang bral ba 'di'i sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i yul la phyogs zhes bya ba ga las yin /
translated: Therefore, even though it is different, how can it be said that it is directed toward the object of blue, yellow, and so on, which is free from aspect?

original: sngon po la sogs pa khyad par ma @15b rtogs par ni mngon du phyogs pa'i khyad par mi rtogs so //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa khyad par ma @15b rtogs par ni mngon du phyogs pa'i khyad par mi rtogs so //
translated: Without understanding the difference of blue and so on, the difference in being directed toward is not understood.

original: gal te de yod na de ni mngon du phyogs pa brjod pas ci bya /
analyzed: gal te de yod na de ni mngon du phyogs pa brjod pas ci bya /
translated: If it does exist, what is the use of saying that it is manifest?

original: yang na de thams cad kyang tha dad pa med ces bya ba ni sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa rig pa tha dad kyang /
analyzed: yang na de thams cad kyang tha dad pa med ces bya ba ni sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa rig pa tha dad kyang /
translated: Or, if all of that is not different, then, although the cognitions of blue, yellow, etc. are different,

original: tha dad pa med pa'i dbang po la /
analyzed: tha dad pa med pa'i dbang po la /
translated: how could it be that they are not different in the sense that

original: 'di'i byed pa ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba ga las yin /
analyzed: 'di'i byed pa ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba ga las yin /
translated: ‚Äúthis is the function of that‚Äù?

original: mngon du phyogs pa'i khyad par las khyad par yod do zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon du phyogs pa'i khyad par las khyad par yod do zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If you say that the difference is due to the difference in the manifest, that is not so,

original: mngon du phyogs pa ni rnam pa'i khyad par med pa ni khyad par du rtogs par mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod zin to //
analyzed: mngon du phyogs pa ni rnam pa'i khyad par med pa ni khyad par du rtogs par mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod zin to //
translated: because, as has been said, the manifest, which is not different in aspect, cannot be cognized as different.

original: des na rnam pa'i khyad par nyid don du gnyer bar bya'o //
analyzed: des na rnam pa'i khyad par nyid don du gnyer bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the difference in aspect itself should be sought.

original: de yod do zhe na gzhan gyis ci bya ;
analyzed: de yod do zhe na gzhan gyis ci bya ;
translated: If you say that it exists, what is the use of the other?

original: gal te don gyi rnam pa ni don nyid yin gyi shes pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te don gyi rnam pa ni don nyid yin gyi shes pa ni ma yin te /
translated: If the aspect of the object is the object itself and not consciousness,

original: de ni don nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni don nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is cognized as the object itself.

original: rnam pa de ni kha dog dang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid bems po'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs pa yin la /
analyzed: rnam pa de ni kha dog dang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid bems po'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs pa yin la /
translated: That aspect is understood to be the nature of form and shape, which is the nature of matter.

original: shes pa ni de las bzlog pa rtogs pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs so zhe na /
analyzed: shes pa ni de las bzlog pa rtogs pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs so zhe na /
translated: Consciousness is understood to be the nature of understanding, which is the opposite of that.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: rnam pa ma rtogs par rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid rtogs par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa ma rtogs par rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid rtogs par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because without understanding the aspect, it is not possible to understand the nature of understanding.

original: sngon po la sogs pa dang / bde ba la sogs pa ma rtogs par shes pa'i rnam pa gzhan mtshon pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa dang / bde ba la sogs pa ma rtogs par shes pa'i rnam pa gzhan mtshon pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because without understanding blue, etc., and pleasure, etc., the aspect of consciousness is not indicated.

original: 'o na ni shes pa lkog tu gyur ba yin pa'am /
analyzed: 'o na ni shes pa lkog tu gyur ba yin pa'am /
translated: Well, then, consciousness would be hidden,

original: yang na med pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: yang na med pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: or it would not exist at all.

original: de ni mi bzang ste /
analyzed: de ni mi bzang ste /
translated: That is not good.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / gal te shes de lkog gyur na //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gal te shes de lkog gyur na //
translated: If that consciousness is hidden,

original: shes pa zhes bya de gang las //üîΩlkog tu gyur pa de yi ni //
analyzed: shes pa zhes bya de gang las // lkog tu gyur pa de yi ni //
translated: from what is it called consciousness?üîΩWho can understand

original: rang bzhin su yis shes par nus //
analyzed: rang bzhin su yis shes par nus //
translated: the nature of that hidden thing?

original: gang las don ni lkog gyur min //
analyzed: gang las don ni lkog gyur min //
translated: If you say that the object is not hidden

original: de ma shes par 'dod ce na //
analyzed: de ma shes par 'dod ce na //
translated: and that is not understood,

original: don ni lkog tu ma gyur nyid //
analyzed: don ni lkog tu ma gyur nyid //
translated: the object is not hidden at all.

original: shes yin 'dir ni gzhan ci dgos //
analyzed: shes yin 'dir ni gzhan ci dgos //
translated: What else is there to be known here?

original: don gnas na ni 'di yod cing ;
analyzed: don gnas na ni 'di yod cing ;
translated: If the object exists, then this exists;

original: ; mi gnas na ni med pa nyid //
analyzed: ; mi gnas na ni med pa nyid //
translated: if it does not exist, then this does not exist.

original: des na don yod ces bya ba //
analyzed: des na don yod ces bya ba //
translated: Therefore, it is said that the object exists.

original: 'di ni 'bad pa med par 'grub //
analyzed: 'di ni 'bad pa med par 'grub //
translated: This is established without effort.

original: 'dis ni med pa yang spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni med pa yang spangs pa yin no //
translated: And this also avoids the error of nonexistence.

original: nyams su myong ba'i dus na lkog tu gyur pa las tha dad par sngon po la sogs pa myong ba med do //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba'i dus na lkog tu gyur pa las tha dad par sngon po la sogs pa myong ba med do //
translated: At the time of experience, there is no experience of blue, etc., apart from the hidden entity.

original: des na de ni sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa yin no ;
analyzed: des na de ni sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa yin no ;
translated: Therefore, it is the aspect of blue, etc.

original: / de'i khyad par gyi rang bzhin du gyur pa'i sngon po ni gzhan nyid de /
analyzed: / de'i khyad par gyi rang bzhin du gyur pa'i sngon po ni gzhan nyid de /
translated: The blue that is the nature of its distinction is different from it,

original: me long gi bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan las bzhin nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: me long gi bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan las bzhin nyid bzhin no //
translated: like a face is different from the reflection of the face in a mirror.

original: de'i phyir de ni rnam pa nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ni rnam pa nyid yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, it is the aspect,

original: don rang nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: don rang nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: not the object itself.

original: gal te me long gi gzugs brnyan dang / gzugs gnyis ka yang rtogs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te me long gi gzugs brnyan dang / gzugs gnyis ka yang rtogs pa ma yin nam /
translated: If the reflection in a mirror and the form are not both perceived,

original: @16a * // 'dir ni rnam pa las ma gtogs pa'i don rtogs pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: @16a * // 'dir ni rnam pa las ma gtogs pa'i don rtogs pa med do zhe na /
translated: here the object is not perceived apart from the aspect.

original: 'di ni 'og nas bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'og nas bstan par bya'o //
translated: This will be explained later.

original: 'di ni re zhig gzhag go //
analyzed: 'di ni re zhig gzhag go //
translated: This is for the time being set aside.

original: rang nyid gsal ba bems po'i rang bzhin du bsgrub par yang ci ltar nus /
analyzed: rang nyid gsal ba bems po'i rang bzhin du bsgrub par yang ci ltar nus /
translated: How can one prove that consciousness itself is of the nature of a non-revealer?

original: gal te gang las 'di 'gyur ba //
analyzed: gal te gang las 'di 'gyur ba //
translated: If it is said that it is from this that it arises,

original: don lkog tu ma gyur pa las gzhan 'ga' zhig yod do zhes bsgrub pa de'i tshe bag chags yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don lkog tu ma gyur pa las gzhan 'ga' zhig yod do zhes bsgrub pa de'i tshe bag chags yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: then when it is proved that there is something else, an object that is not hidden, it is a latent impression.

original: rnam par shes pa'i don gyi rnam pa 'di bag chags kyi stobs las byung ba yin gyi /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i don gyi rnam pa 'di bag chags kyi stobs las byung ba yin gyi /
translated: This aspect of the object of consciousness arises from the power of the latent impression,

original: don ni bag chags kyi stobs las byung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: don ni bag chags kyi stobs las byung ba ma yin te /
translated: but the object does not arise from the power of the latent impression,

original: de med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that it does not exist.

original: bag chags kyi stobs las byung ba ni don gyis stong par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bag chags kyi stobs las byung ba ni don gyis stong par 'gyur te /
translated: What arises from the power of the latent impression is empty of object,

original: rmi lam gyi rnam pa bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: rmi lam gyi rnam pa bzhin no zhe na /
translated: like the aspect in a dream.

original: gang gis sad tshe mthong ba yi //
analyzed: gang gis sad tshe mthong ba yi //
translated: But the aspect that is seen when awake

original: rnam pa don stong mi 'gyur pa //
analyzed: rnam pa don stong mi 'gyur pa //
translated: is not empty of an object.

original: bag chags kyi ni khyad par dag /'ga' zhig de la yod pa yin //
analyzed: bag chags kyi ni khyad par dag /'ga' zhig de la yod pa yin //
translated: There is some difference in the latent impressions.

original: re zhig rmi lam la sogs par bag chags rnam pa'i skyed par byed pa nyid du ni dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: re zhig rmi lam la sogs par bag chags rnam pa'i skyed par byed pa nyid du ni dmigs pa yin no //
translated: But in dreams and so on, the aspect of the latent impression is observed to be the cause of the appearance of the object.

original: des na sad pa na dmigs pa'i yul 'di yang de nyid las yin par rtogs te /
analyzed: des na sad pa na dmigs pa'i yul 'di yang de nyid las yin par rtogs te /
translated: Therefore, when one awakens, one understands that the object of perception is the same as that.

original: de'i rigs can yin pa'i phyin ro //
analyzed: de'i rigs can yin pa'i phyin ro //
translated: Because it is of the same type.

original: rnam pa de nyid de yin par ma grub ste /
analyzed: rnam pa de nyid de yin par ma grub ste /
translated: That very aspect is not established as being that.

original: de ni don nyid zhes rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni don nyid zhes rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
translated: Because it is understood to be the object itself.üîΩNo, because of delusion. Even the aspect of dream consciousness is understood to be the object.

original: 'khrul pa'i phyir rmi lam gyi shes pa'i rnam pa yang don yin no zhes rtogs pa nyid do / brtags na gzhan du rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i phyir rmi lam gyi shes pa'i rnam pa yang don yin no zhes rtogs pa nyid do / brtags na gzhan du rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If it is argued that it is not so because it is understood differently when examined,

original: 'dir yang brtags pa /
analyzed: 'dir yang brtags pa /
translated: here too it is examined:

original: bya rog gis zos pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bya rog gis zos pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not that it is eaten by crows.

original: bag chags kyi khyad par yang las sad pa'i gnas skabs kyi rnam pa nyid don dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba brtags pa ni mchog go //
analyzed: bag chags kyi khyad par yang las sad pa'i gnas skabs kyi rnam pa nyid don dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba brtags pa ni mchog go //
translated: The special latent impression is the aspect of the awakened state itself, which is said to be meaningful. This examination is supreme.

original: rmi lam la sogs pa'i shes pa yang rnam pa dang bcas pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rmi lam la sogs pa'i shes pa yang rnam pa dang bcas pa ma yin te /
translated: Dream consciousness and so on also do not have aspects.

original: de la yang don yod pa'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de la yang don yod pa'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is because the object exists,

original: 'di ni 'og nas bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'og nas bstan par bya'o //
translated: this will be explained later.

original: 'on te don gyi rnam pa ni lkog tu gyur pa'i ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on te don gyi rnam pa ni lkog tu gyur pa'i ma yin te /
translated: But the aspect of the object is not hidden,

original: sngon po la sogs pa don gyi rnam pa ni don nyid yin no //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa don gyi rnam pa ni don nyid yin no //
translated: because the aspect of the object, such as blue, is the object itself.

original: de ni dngos bo nye bas de ltar mngon pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni dngos bo nye bas de ltar mngon pa yin te /
translated: It is perceived in that way because the thing is near.

original: me long la gzugs brnyan bzhin no //
analyzed: me long la gzugs brnyan bzhin no //
translated: It is like a reflection in a mirror.

original: me long la rnam pa med pa yin yang bzhin nye pas rnam pa dang bcas par mtshon pa yin no //
analyzed: me long la rnam pa med pa yin yang bzhin nye pas rnam pa dang bcas par mtshon pa yin no //
translated: Even though there is no aspect in the mirror, the face is perceived as having an aspect because it is near.

original: yang na sgron ma la sogs pa'i mthu las yin no //
analyzed: yang na sgron ma la sogs pa'i mthu las yin no //
translated: Or it is due to the power of the lamp, etc.

original: sgron ma'i 'od ni rnam pa med pa'i bum pa la sogs pa khyab @16b pas bum pa la sogs pa'i rnam par mngon pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sgron ma'i 'od ni rnam pa med pa'i bum pa la sogs pa khyab @16b pas bum pa la sogs pa'i rnam par mngon pa yin no zhe na /
translated: The light of the lamp, which has no aspect, pervades the pot, etc., so the pot, etc., are perceived as having aspects.

original: de ni mi bzang ste /üîΩbzhin la sogs pa med par yang //
analyzed: de ni mi bzang ste / bzhin la sogs pa med par yang //
translated: That is not good,üîΩbecause the face, etc., are seen in the mirror, etc.,

original: me long la sogs mthong ba yin //
analyzed: me long la sogs mthong ba yin //
translated: even though they are not there.

original: rnam pa las ni tha dad du //
analyzed: rnam pa las ni tha dad du //
translated: Without a difference from the aspect,

original: lkog tu ma gyur mthong ba med //
analyzed: lkog tu ma gyur mthong ba med //
translated: a hidden object is not seen.

original: lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid ni thams cad kyi tshe sngon po'i rnam pa'i bdag nyid du gyur par rtogs kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid ni thams cad kyi tshe sngon po'i rnam pa'i bdag nyid du gyur par rtogs kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not hidden, for it is always understood as having the nature of the aspect of blue, not as something else.

original: des na don nye bar ci zhig bya /
analyzed: des na don nye bar ci zhig bya /
translated: What use is there in positing an object?

original: 'di ltar snang ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar snang ngo //
translated: It appears thus.

original: 'di lta pur gyur pa zhig gi zhes bya ba 'di la tshad ma ci yod /
analyzed: 'di lta pur gyur pa zhig gi zhes bya ba 'di la tshad ma ci yod /
translated: What is the validating cognition that this is so?

original: khyed la yang tshad ma ci yod ce na /
analyzed: khyed la yang tshad ma ci yod ce na /
translated: What is your validating cognition?

original: tha mi dang bar dmigs pa nyid do //
analyzed: tha mi dang bar dmigs pa nyid do //
translated: It is the perception of the object.

original: de ni 'khrul pa nyid do zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni 'khrul pa nyid do zhe na ma yin te /
translated: That is mistaken.

original: gnod par byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnod par byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because there is no contradiction.

original: don 'thob pa'i phyir pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: don 'thob pa'i phyir pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because it is the attainment of the object.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩüîΩ

original: thob pa ni de'i rnam pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thob pa ni de'i rnam pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because attainment is characterized by the aspect of that.

original: de'i rnam pa las ma gtogs pa'i thob pa ni med do zhes bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa las ma gtogs pa'i thob pa ni med do zhes bstan par bya'o //
translated: It is to be demonstrated that there is no attainment apart from the aspect of that.

original: gal te de lta bur gyur pa'i rnam par ma gyur na /
analyzed: gal te de lta bur gyur pa'i rnam par ma gyur na /
translated: If it were not so,

original: don so sor nges pa'i rnam par gzhag pa 'ga' yang med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don so sor nges pa'i rnam par gzhag pa 'ga' yang med par 'gyur ro //
translated: there would be no establishment of the determination of the object.

original: 'dis ni lhag ma bshad pa yin //üîΩde dngos med na khyad par gyi //
analyzed: 'dis ni lhag ma bshad pa yin // de dngos med na khyad par gyi //
translated: The rest is explained by this.üîΩIf it does not exist, the cognition of difference

original: blo yang tha dad med 'gyur te //
analyzed: blo yang tha dad med 'gyur te //
translated: would not exist.

original: blo gzhan dag kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: blo gzhan dag kyang de bzhin no //
translated: The same is true of other cognitions.

original: lhag ma ni lta ba dang / don dang phrad pas sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni lta ba dang / don dang phrad pas sogs pa'o //
translated: The rest is the seeing of the object, etc.

original: de na dang phrad pa yang rnam pa las 'das te shes pa ni med do //
analyzed: de na dang phrad pa yang rnam pa las 'das te shes pa ni med do //
translated: The contact with that is beyond the form, but there is no cognition.

original: des na de dag kyang bya ba la sgrub par byed pa dam pa ma yin te /
analyzed: des na de dag kyang bya ba la sgrub par byed pa dam pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, they are not the ultimate establishment of action.

original: chod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the obstruction.

original: khyad par gyi blo yang de'i rnam pa med na khyad par gyi blo nyid du mi 'grub po //
analyzed: khyad par gyi blo yang de'i rnam pa med na khyad par gyi blo nyid du mi 'grub po //
translated: Also, the cognition of difference, if it does not have the form of that, is not established as the cognition of difference.

original: khyad par can gyi blo la sogs pa yang de bzhin te /
analyzed: khyad par can gyi blo la sogs pa yang de bzhin te /
translated: The cognition of the possessor of difference, etc., are the same.

original: des na de dag kyang byed pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: des na de dag kyang byed pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, they are also not the agent itself.

original: gal te re zhig khyad par gyi blo dus sngar yin na //
analyzed: gal te re zhig khyad par gyi blo dus sngar yin na //
translated: If the cognition of difference is prior,

original: 'di ni khyad par yin no zhes ji ltar shes par bya /
analyzed: 'di ni khyad par yin no zhes ji ltar shes par bya /
translated: how is it known that this is the difference?

original: khyad par can la brten pa med par ni /
analyzed: khyad par can la brten pa med par ni /
translated: Without depending on the possessor of difference,

original: khyad par zhes bya bar 'gyur ba ma yin la /
analyzed: khyad par zhes bya bar 'gyur ba ma yin la /
translated: It is not that it becomes a qualifier.

original: de'i rang bzhin la brten par 'dzin pa med par khyad par nyid du 'dzin pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin la brten par 'dzin pa med par khyad par nyid du 'dzin pa yang ma yin no //
translated: And it is not that it apprehends the qualifier without apprehending the nature of the qualifier.

original: de'i rnam pa 'dzin pa khyad par can yang bzung ba'i phyir ji ltar khyad par can gyi blo de las gzhan du gyur pa bsgrub bya yin par 'gyur /üîΩde nyid kyi tshe na bzung ba ni /
analyzed: de'i rnam pa 'dzin pa khyad par can yang bzung ba'i phyir ji ltar khyad par can gyi blo de las gzhan du gyur pa bsgrub bya yin par 'gyur / de nyid kyi tshe na bzung ba ni /
translated: And because it apprehends the form of the qualifier, how could the qualifier be the object to be established, which is different from the cognition of the qualifier?üîΩAt that time, the object is not the object generated by the cognition that apprehends it.

original: de 'dzin par byed pa'i blos bskyed pa'i 'dzin par byed pa'i bzung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de 'dzin par byed pa'i blos bskyed pa'i 'dzin par byed pa'i bzung ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not the object of the cognition that apprehends it.

original: de'i dus su yang khyad par snang ngo zhe na /
analyzed: de'i dus su yang khyad par snang ngo zhe na /
translated: If you say that at that time the qualifier appears,

original: sngar de 'dzin pa don med do //
analyzed: sngar de 'dzin pa don med do //
translated: then it is pointless to apprehend it earlier.

original: sngar yang @17a * //
analyzed: sngar yang @17a * //
translated: Even earlier,

original: khyad par can snang ngo //
analyzed: khyad par can snang ngo //
translated: the qualifier appears.

original: zhes pa ni mi 'thad do //
analyzed: zhes pa ni mi 'thad do //
translated: This is untenable.

original: sgrub par byed pa nyid med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa nyid med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it follows that there would be no proof.

original: gzhan yang khyad par gyi blo ni khyad par la yin la /
analyzed: gzhan yang khyad par gyi blo ni khyad par la yin la /
translated: Moreover, the cognition of the qualifier is of the qualifier.

original: khyad par can la ni de'i blo yin pa'i phyir bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag yul tha dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyad par can la ni de'i blo yin pa'i phyir bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag yul tha dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: But if the object is special, then the action and the instrument would have different objects, because the cognition would be of that.

original: gyur mod ci skyon zhe na ;
analyzed: gyur mod ci skyon zhe na ;
translated: What is wrong with that?

original: bya ba dang ni sgrub byed gnyis //
analyzed: bya ba dang ni sgrub byed gnyis //
translated: The action and the instrument

original: yul tha dad pa'ang mi 'dod do //
analyzed: yul tha dad pa'ang mi 'dod do //
translated: are not accepted as having different objects.

original: don gcig yin na gnyis don med //
analyzed: don gcig yin na gnyis don med //
translated: If they have the same object, then two would be useless,

original: rim bzhin 'byung ba'ang med par 'gyur //
analyzed: rim bzhin 'byung ba'ang med par 'gyur //
translated: and there would be no sequence.

original: pa la sha la sta re la sogs pa'i byed pa zhugs na nya gro dha chad pa sgrub pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: pa la sha la sta re la sogs pa'i byed pa zhugs na nya gro dha chad pa sgrub pa ni ma yin no //
translated: When the action of the axe, etc. is applied to the tree, etc., the axe, etc. are not the instrument of cutting the tree, etc.

original: don gcig yin na ni snga ma bzhin du thal lo //
analyzed: don gcig yin na ni snga ma bzhin du thal lo //
translated: If they have the same object, then the same absurd consequence as before follows.

original: gnyis don med pa dang / don de'i rgyu can gyi blo thams cad rim gyis 'byung ba 'gal bar yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: gnyis don med pa dang / don de'i rgyu can gyi blo thams cad rim gyis 'byung ba 'gal bar yang 'gyur te /
translated: If they have the same object, then all cognitions having that object would be useless and would occur in sequence, which is contradictory.

original: gcig la rim pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig la rim pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because sequence is not possible for a single thing.

original: bzlas pa'i bye brag gis rim par 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: bzlas pa'i bye brag gis rim par 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If you say that sequence is due to the difference of repetition, that is not so,

original: bzlas pa'i bye brag ni mngon sum gyis rtogs par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bzlas pa'i bye brag ni mngon sum gyis rtogs par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the difference of repetition cannot be understood by direct perception.

original: gal te shes pa de nyid bskyar ba yin no zhes rtogs pa de ltar na bzlas par yid ches par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te shes pa de nyid bskyar ba yin no zhes rtogs pa de ltar na bzlas par yid ches par 'gyur ro //
translated: If you think that the cognition itself is repeated, then you would have to believe that the recitation is repeated.

original: rim gyis byung yang tha mi dad pa'i rang bzhin 'dzin pa'i blo dag phan tshun bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //üîΩsnga mas phyi ma bskyed pa'i bya ba nyid byed kyi rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rim gyis byung yang tha mi dad pa'i rang bzhin 'dzin pa'i blo dag phan tshun bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa ma yin no // snga mas phyi ma bskyed pa'i bya ba nyid byed kyi rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Even if they occur in sequence, the cognitions that apprehend the same nature are not mutually the object and the means of knowledge.

original: snga ma dang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snga ma dang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The former does not act as the means of knowledge of the latter, because it is not different from the latter.

original: bskyed pa'i bya ba yang de'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma yin no zhes gzhan du bstan zin to //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i bya ba yang de'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma yin no zhes gzhan du bstan zin to //
translated: And the activity of producing is not different from its nature, as has been explained elsewhere.

original: blo ni cig car 'byung 'gyur na //
analyzed: blo ni cig car 'byung 'gyur na //
translated: If the cognitions occur simultaneously,

original: bsgrub bya sgrub byed med par 'gyur //üîΩde rnams gzhag la brten nas ni //
analyzed: bsgrub bya sgrub byed med par 'gyur // de rnams gzhag la brten nas ni //
translated: there would be no object and means of knowledge.üîΩThe parts are posited in dependence on the whole,

original: cha dag bsgrub bya sgrub byed gzhag / ces bya ba ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: cha dag bsgrub bya sgrub byed gzhag / ces bya ba ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o //
translated: and the object and means of knowledge are posited in dependence on them.

original: phrad pa yang tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: phrad pa yang tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: Contact is not a valid means of knowledge,

original: 'di ltar / bdag nyid kun gyis 'brel na yang //
analyzed: 'di ltar / bdag nyid kun gyis 'brel na yang //
translated: because even when they are connected by their whole nature,

original: chos 'ga' zhig gis rtogs 'gyur ba'i //
analyzed: chos 'ga' zhig gis rtogs 'gyur ba'i //
translated: The cognition that arises from the contact of the sense faculty and the object is not a valid cognition, because it is not certain.

original: nges pa de ni mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: nges pa de ni mi 'gyur te //
translated: The cognition that arises from the contact of the sense faculty and the object is not a valid cognition, because it is not certain.

original: 'brel pa bye brag med phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa bye brag med phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no distinction in the contact.

original: gal te dbang po dang don phrad pa tshad ma yin la /
analyzed: gal te dbang po dang don phrad pa tshad ma yin la /
translated: If the contact of the sense faculty and the object is a valid cognition,

original: de'i 'bras bu don rtogs pa yin na ;
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu don rtogs pa yin na ;
translated: and the result of that is the cognition of the object,

original: phrad pa de ni sbyor ba dang / 'byor pa'i 'du ba dang 'byor ba'i 'dus pa'i 'du ba dang / 'du ba dang 'dus pa'i 'du ba dang / 'byor pa dang khyad par can gyi dngos po'o //
analyzed: phrad pa de ni sbyor ba dang / 'byor pa'i 'du ba dang 'byor ba'i 'dus pa'i 'du ba dang / 'du ba dang 'dus pa'i 'du ba dang / 'byor pa dang khyad par can gyi dngos po'o //
translated: then that contact is either a connection, a combination of endowment and connection, a combination of the combination of endowment and connection, a combination of endowment and particular entity, or an endowment and particular entity.

original: dbang po bum pa la sogs pa dang ni sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: dbang po bum pa la sogs pa dang ni sbyor ba yin no //
translated: The sense faculty is connected with the pot, etc.

original: bum pa la 'dus pa'i yon tan dang ni 'byor pa'i @17b 'du ba'o //
analyzed: bum pa la 'dus pa'i yon tan dang ni 'byor pa'i @17b 'du ba'o //
translated: The pot's combined qualities are the combination of endowment and connection.

original: dkar po nyid la sogs pa dang / yon tan nyid dang ni 'byor pa'i 'dus pa'i 'du ba'o //
analyzed: dkar po nyid la sogs pa dang / yon tan nyid dang ni 'byor pa'i 'dus pa'i 'du ba'o //
translated: Whiteness, etc. and quality are the combination of the combination of endowment and connection.

original: rna ba nam mkha'i bdag nyid kyi sgra dang 'du ba'o //
analyzed: rna ba nam mkha'i bdag nyid kyi sgra dang 'du ba'o //
translated: The ear is connected with sound, which has the nature of space.

original: sgra nyid dang ni 'dus pa'i 'du ba'o //
analyzed: sgra nyid dang ni 'dus pa'i 'du ba'o //
translated: Sound itself is the combination of connection.

original: dbang po phyogs na bum pa med pa dang ni 'byor pa'i khyad par gyi khyad par can gyi dngos po yin no ;
analyzed: dbang po phyogs na bum pa med pa dang ni 'byor pa'i khyad par gyi khyad par can gyi dngos po yin no ;
translated: The pot is not related to the sense faculty, but is related to the particular that is qualified by the particular of the universal.

original: / de la gal te sbyor bas 'brel pa yin na /
analyzed: / de la gal te sbyor bas 'brel pa yin na /
translated: If the relation is that of inherence,

original: de 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ga las /
analyzed: de 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ga las /
translated: how can the sense faculty apprehend the particular?üîΩIf it is not so, then one would also understand fire, etc., which are related to smoke, etc.

original: de ltar ma yin na du ba dang 'brel pa'i sems pa'i me la sogs pa yang rtogs par 'gyur 'on te 'du ba'i 'brel pa la sogs pa yin na /
analyzed: de ltar ma yin na du ba dang 'brel pa'i sems pa'i me la sogs pa yang rtogs par 'gyur 'on te 'du ba'i 'brel pa la sogs pa yin na /
translated: But if the relation is that of inherence, etc.,

original: de lta na ni 'o na don gcig la 'du ba can gyi reg pa la sogs pa yang mig gis rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na don gcig la 'du ba can gyi reg pa la sogs pa yang mig gis rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: then one would also understand contact, etc., which inhere in the same object as the eye sense faculty.

original: 'dis ni yul mtshungs pa nyid kyang bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni yul mtshungs pa nyid kyang bsal ba yin no //
translated: This also eliminates the requirement that the object be of the same nature.

original: ji ltar don gcig la 'du ba can gyi dbyibs rtogs pa de bzhin du reg pa la sogs pa yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar don gcig la 'du ba can gyi dbyibs rtogs pa de bzhin du reg pa la sogs pa yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as one understands the shape that inheres in the same object, so too one would understand contact, etc.

original: mig gis gzung ba ma yin pa'i phyir mi rtogs so zhe na /
analyzed: mig gis gzung ba ma yin pa'i phyir mi rtogs so zhe na /
translated: If you say that one does not understand it because it is not apprehended by the eye,

original: don gcig la 'du ba can yin pa'i phyir ci ltar mig gis gzung ba ma yin zhes de nyid dpyod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: don gcig la 'du ba can yin pa'i phyir ci ltar mig gis gzung ba ma yin zhes de nyid dpyod pa ma yin nam /
translated: Since they are all included in the same object, is it not the case that you are analyzing reality itself when you ask how the object is not perceived by the eye?

original: de'i phyir bdag nyid thams cad kyis 'brel yang chos 'ga' zhig kho nas rtogs par nges pa mi 'thad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir bdag nyid thams cad kyis 'brel yang chos 'ga' zhig kho nas rtogs par nges pa mi 'thad do //
translated: Therefore, even if there is contact in all respects, it is not tenable that the object is ascertained to be perceived by some property.

original: gal te mig la sogs pa'i rngul phra rab phyi rol du song ste /
analyzed: gal te mig la sogs pa'i rngul phra rab phyi rol du song ste /
translated: If the subtle particles of the eye and so on go outside,

original: don gyi yul du phyin nas de dang sbyor ba ni don 'dzin pa'i rgyu yin na /
analyzed: don gyi yul du phyin nas de dang sbyor ba ni don 'dzin pa'i rgyu yin na /
translated: and having gone to the object‚Äôs location, they connect with it, then that is the cause for apprehending the object.

original: don ltar yin na bdag nyid thams cad kyis 'brel pa'i phyir rang bzhin ma lus pa rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'khyog po dang / gseng po la sogs pa'i chos kyang gsal bar snang bar snang bar 'gyur ro //
